name: Leo Shimonaka

experience.title: Writer of Code at Apple
experience.detail: Wrote code on different days at different places for stuff.

bio: I like coffee and music like every other human being ever. I can pretend to be interested in any project involving tech buzzwords, like 'machine learning,' 'internet of things,' 'virtual reality,' and 'the next big thing.' Autobiography coming soon.
smallBio: Human being, person, and homo sapiens. Not interested in solving real problems. I want to volunteer at a sloth sanctuary instead.
